title: No Witnesses or Video of Muriel Furrer’s Fatal Zürich Worlds Crash
content:
'It's a disgrace': Spain's Juan Ayuso criticizes absence of race radio that he suggests might have contributed to the tragedy that rocked the UCI road cycling worlds.

Read the full article at No Witnesses or Video of Muriel Furrer’s Fatal Zürich Worlds Crash on Velo.
